channel.title: Published on David Haney - Blogging my experiences as a developer and engineering manager.
channel.description: Recent content in Published on David Haney - Blogging my experiences as a developer and engineering manager.

item.title: Published by Red Gate
item.description: As of today I’ve been published in an e-Book offered for free by Red Gate! It is called 50 Ways to Avoid, Find and Fix ASP.NET Performance Issues and contains many useful performance tips which have been contributed by various members of the .NET community. Many tips are ASP.NET MVC specific which is also a plus. My tip is #3 and has to do with debugging Microsoft symbols. Get a free copy here – it has already taught me a few things I had never thought to consider!

item.title: Published by MDSN UK Blog
item.description: This isn’t a very technical post, but I was published by Microsoft recently via their MSDN UK Blog! The article is on creating and maintaining a successful User Group. Click here to read the article!
